title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Addition to White House Staff – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
April 15, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced the addition of Kevin Hassett to serve as a Senior Advisor to the President.  Hassett returns to the White House as a special government employee and will work closely with President Trump’s economic team.  Previously, Hassett served as the 29th Chairman of the White House Council of Economic Advisers.
